title: Criticism of the Western Civilization-C. 63 (American Issues 6)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 63 (American Issues 6):

We have 33 titles here:

-  Bouza - The Decline and Fall of the American Empire; Corruption, Decadence, and the American Dream (1996)

-  Buchanan - Suicide of a Superpower; Will America Survive to 2025 (2011)

-  Callahan - Fortunes of Change; the Rise of the Liberal Rich and the Remaking of America (2010)

-  Carter & Welner - Closing the Opportunity Gap; What America Must Do to Give Every Child an Even Chance (2013)

-  Chapman & Ciment (Eds.) - Culture Wars in America; an Encyclopedia of Issues, Viewpoints, and Voices, 2e (2014)

-  Dore - Your Country Is Just Not That into You; How the Media, Wall Street, and Both Political Parties Keep on Screwing You.. (2014)

-  Epstein - Welfare in America; How Social Science Fails the Poor (1997)

-  Flint (Ed.) - Spaces of Hate; Geographies of Discrimination and Intolerance in the U.S.A. (2004)

-  Furchtgott-Roth & Meyer - Disinherited; How Washington Is Betraying America's Young (2015)

-  Green - Inventing a Christian America; the Myth of the Religious Founding (2015)

-  Hasday - Forty-Nine Minutes of Madness; the Columbine High School Shooting (2013)

-  Kiernan - American Mojo Lost and Found; Restoring Our Middle Class before the World Blows by (2015)

-  Laymon - How to Slowly Kill Yourself and Others in America (2013)

-  Levin - Plunder and Deceit; Big Government's Exploitation of Young People and the Future (2015)

-  Levinson - Framed; America's 51 Constitutions and the Crisis of Governance (2012)

-  Libby - The Criminalization of Medicine; America's War on Medicine (2008)

-  Looman & Carl - A Country Called Prison; Mass Incarceration and the Making of a New Nation (2015)

-  Lorentzen (Ed.) - Hidden Lives and Human Rights in the United States; Understanding the Controversies and Tragedies of Undocumented Immigration (2014)

-  Mason - Justice in America; How Prosecutors and the Media Conspire Against the Accused (2014)

-  Paarlberg - The United States of Excess; Gluttony and the Dark Side of American Exceptionalism (2015)

-  Prasad - The Land of Too Much; American Abundance and the Paradox of Poverty (2012)

-  Putnam - Our Kids; the American Dream in Crisis (2015)

-  Quirk & Bridwell - Abandoned; the Betrayal of the American Middle Class since World War II (1992)

-  Rasor & Bauman - Betraying Our Troops; the Destructive Results of Privatizing War (2007)

-  Rottinghaus - The Institutional Effects of Executive Scandals (2015)

-  Schiff - The Federal Mafia; How the Government Illegally Imposes and Unlawfully Collects Income Taxes, 3e (2000)

-  Schultz & Schultz - It Did Happen Here; Recollections of Political Repression in America (1989)

-  Tierney - The Right Way to Lose a War; America in an Age of Unwinnable Conflicts (2015)

-  Wexler - America's Secret Jihad; the Hidden History of Religious Terrorism in the United States (2015)

-  Wicker - Not in Kansas Anymore; a Curious Tale of How Magic Is Transforming America (2005)

-  Wiley - Angelic Troublemakers; Religion and Anarchism in America (2014)

-  Williams - Our Enemies in Blue; Police and Power in America, 3e (2015)

-  Zayas - Forgotten Citizens; Deportation, Children, and the Making of American Exiles and Orphans (2015)
